attributes.action: Stop radioactive mud from Hinkley Point being dumped off Cardiff's coast.
attributes.background: EDF Energy, which is building the Hinkley Point C reactor in north Somerset, has a marine licence to dump up to 200,000 cubic metres of dredged material close to Cardiff Bay.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for.  

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:
http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
